description: A showcase of melting glaciers, alpine meadows, carved valleys, and spectacular lakes. With over 700 miles of trails, Glacier is a paradise for adventurous visitors seeking a landscape steeped in human culture. Relive the days of old through historic chalets, lodges, and the famous Going-to-the-Sun Road.

operatingHours.description: Glacier National Park is open 24 hours a day 365 days of the year. An entrance fee is required, even when entrance stations are not staffed. Instructions are available at each entrance for self-payment.
operatingHours.name: Glacier National Park

images.title: Glacier Lilies near Logan Pass
images.altText: Large mountains dotted with snow loom above a rocky meadow filled with yellow flowers.
images.caption: Glacier lilies dot the landscape off the Highline Trail.

images.title: St. Mary Falls
images.altText: A double waterfall blurs over layered rocks.
images.caption: Glacier National Park is sculpted by water.

images.title: Lobby of the Lake McDonald Lodge
images.altText: Looking down into the lobby of the Lake McDonald Lodge from the balcony
images.caption: Lobby of the historic Lake McDonald Lodge

images.title: Alpine Sunset
images.altText: Clouds of orange and red sit above dark-gray mountains; snow dots the mountain peaks.
images.caption: Majestic Heavens Peak is easily viewed from the Going-to-the-Sun Road.

images.title: Swiftcurrent Fire Lookout
images.altText: A small, brown and white structure sits on a rocky top with mountain peaks in the distance.
images.caption: The historic Swiftcurrent Lookout was built in a Swiss chalet architectural style.

images.title: East Side Sunset
images.altText: Jagged peaks rise out of a forested valley and an empty road curves off into the distance.
images.caption: Going-to-the-Sun Road in the St. Mary Valley

images.title: Glacier's Night Sky
images.altText: Silhouetted mountains and flowers against a night sky filled with stars and a milky band of light.
images.caption: Glacier's dark sky is important to wildlife and people.
